T02vamvuppu:748: sotsāhānāṃ nāsty asādhyaṃ narāṇāṃ nyāyārabdhāḥ sarvayatnāḥ phalanti // VMv_4.93 //
T02vamvuppu:749: subahūny api vijñāya vañcanāni mṛter iha /
T02vamvuppu:750: ananuṣṭhānād viṣṭhābhir liptvā śayyāṃ mṛtā vayam // VMv_4.94 //
T02vamvuppu:752: ananuṣṭhānadoṣeṇa dantān niṣkāśya te mṛtāḥ // VMv_4.95 //
T02vamvuppu:754: adya śvo vā kariṣyāma iti cintāparā mṛtāḥ // VMv_4.96 //
T02vamvuppu:755: idaṃ kartāsmi śvaḥ punar idam idaṃ cāsya parato vṛthā prāptāśvāso vimṛśati na lolāṃ bhavagatim /
T02vamvuppu:756: agatvā kāryāntaṃ viṣaya-salilāvartapatitā prajā mṛtyor vaktraṃ makara-mukhavan nauḥ praviśati // VMv_4.97 //
T02vamvuppu:757: iti nigaditam etad vañcanaṃ mṛtyuśatroḥ svaparasamayasiddhadhyānakarmaprasādhyam /
T02vamvuppu:758: aghṛṇamaraṇabhīter yatnataḥ saṃvidheyaṃ yata iha kamanīyaṃ jīvitān nānyad asti // VMv_4.98 //
T02vamvuppu:764: āptam ataḥ kuśalaṃ yad amṛtyus tena jano 'stu sa mṛtyuvimuktaḥ // VMv_4.101 //
T02vamvuppu:767: // iti śrīpaṇḍitācāryavāgīśvarakīrtiviracite mṛtyuvañcanopadeśe caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ //
